attributes.action: Introduce legislation to opt out from paying tax if you are not happy to pay
attributes.additional_details:
Review foreign policy and be take the world stage to promote world peace and make diplomatic relations with overseas political parties.

If countries unite together, war and bloodshed can be avoided and the world would be a better place and David Cameron can achieve this on behalf of UK, he has the wisdom and respect on international stage. 

Our taxes need to be Invested in our country to create world class services and attract talent...if Dubai and other countries can do it so can we...
attributes.background:
We wish our government to introduce legislation or some sort of tax rules in existing legislation to opt out of paying taxes for peace.

Taxes are used to fund potential crime In wars etc which were initially started by labour, taxes spent overseas can be rerouted to fund our services

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It is not clear if you are just asking for people to be given a right to opt out of taxes, or if you are also requesting changes to foreign policy, and how tax is spent.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
